scripts.api-test: newman run API-Tests/e2e/PetStore_Collection.postman_collection.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-title 'SauceDemo API Tests' --reporter-htmlextra-darkTheme true --reporter-htmlextra-showEnvironmentData false --reporter-htmlextra-showFolderDescription false --reporter-htmlextra-showTestScriptData false --reporter-htmlextra-open true
